notes: Can only target trees (including Sprout trees) and enemy Observer Wards and Sentry Wards.
Can also target an enemy Techies' Stasis Traps and Remote Mines, using the same cast range as for wards.
Does not share cooldown with Battle Fury.
abilities.description: Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targeting wards.

notes: Stacks with the Quell of Battle Fury, but not with additional Quelling Blades.
When the owner's attack type changes to ranged or melee, the attack damage bonus adapts immediately.
Quell fully works with crits, cleave, splash, and lifesteal.
When attacking creeps, Quell also causes cleave, splash, and Psi Blades to deal more damage to every unit they hit.
The damage Moon Glaives bounces are not increased, since they are based on the attacker's attack damage value.
Does not work against wards, buildings, Spirit Bear, and allied units. Works against Roshan.
abilities.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 24 for melee heroes, and 7 for ranged.

description: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
tips: The 24 bonus damage to creep on melee heroes is good for last hitting and jungling.
You can lifesteal from the bonus damage.
